message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, Thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the opportunity, $18,000 is a bit out of my range.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Hi Bob, I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep, but $10,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
Alice, $14,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. This is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to explore other options.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to be cautious, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $14,000 and $12,000, so I'm thinking of $13,000. It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. This is a fair price that benefits us both.  Let me know if you're willing to accept.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm thinking of $12,500. It's still a good price considering the value of the product, and it's a bit closer to what I was originally asking. Let me know if that's something you'd be interested in.
